detectors.description: MilliStaffs.onboard(uint256,string,bytes) (contracts/MilliStaffs.sol#52-63)->ECDSA.tryRecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol#148-177) allows cross-chain signature replay: signer = ecrecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)(hash,v,r,s) (@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol#171)
